DOC.brief_title: Neointimal Coverage After Implantation Biolimus Eluting Stent With Biodegradable Polymer : Optical Coherence Tomographic Assessment According Treatment Dyslipidemia Hypertension Types Implanted Drug-eluting Stents
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age ≥ 20 year old 2 . In case blood pressure rest great systolic 140mmHg diastolic 90mmHg 3 . When someone take AntiHypertensive medication 4 . If total cholesterol 200mg/dL LDLcholesterol great 130mg/dL take statin 5 . Significant coronary de novo lesion ( > 70 % quantitative angiographic analysis ) 6 . Patients stable angina acute coronary syndrome consider percutaneous coronary intervention . 7 . Reference vessel diameter 2.5 3.5 mm operator assessment 8 . Complex lesion morphology ( aortoostial , bifurcation > 2.0 mm side branch , unprotected Left main , thrombus , severe calcification , chronic total occlusion ) 7 . Vein graft lesion
